attributes.contentHtml:
I want to apologize be for being rude & being a retard, hypocrite, moron, I am (Lightt/People in life), I am not @bad like some of you think I am. I am a kid, & we all end up mistakes, such I manipulate people, & this is just cringe, buttt.... yeah no, I don't want to talk about stuff, anyways I spend way too much time on screens for over 3 years (such as 6 hours daily on screens), as I grew, I realised what I was fucking doingg. I was just tryna get attentionn, prob cuz I love it. I have been exposed to a lot of shit on the internet & have done a lot of shit on the internet, & I am sorry for that, we all make mistakes, but can change from them.

theres a lot more to that
i have more posts about me on there
on diff accs
which I will not name.

FireShot (such as 6 hours daily on screens)

Rookie numbers.
